  • Method Details

    • thereAreRegisteredClientsInTheSystem

      @Given("there are at least {int} registered clients and at least one of them is named {string}") public void thereAreRegisteredClientsInTheSystem(int numberOfClients, String name)
      This method creates clients if there are less than 10 clients in the system and verifies if the client with the given name is in the system
      Parameters:
      numberOfClients - int with the number of clients to create
      name - String with the name of the client to verify

    • searchForFirstClientNamed

      @When("I search for the first client named {string}") public void searchForFirstClientNamed(String name)
      This method retrieves the first client with the given name
      Parameters:
      name - String with the name of the client to search for and saves the phone number of the client to verify if it has changed after updating

    • updatePhoneNumber

      @When("I update the phone number of {string} to {string}") public void updatePhoneNumber(String name, String newPhoneNumber)
      This method updates the phone number of the client
      Parameters:
      name - String with the name of the client to update
      newPhoneNumber - String with the new phone number to update

    • iSaveTheCurrentPhoneNumber

      @Then("I save the current phone number") public void iSaveTheCurrentPhoneNumber()
      This method verify the current phone number was saved

    • verifyPhoneNumberHasChanged

      @Then("the new phone number should be different from the original") public void verifyPhoneNumberHasChanged()
      This method verifies the phone number has changed

    • theResponseShouldHaveAStatusCodeOf

      @Then("the response should have a status code of {int}") public void theResponseShouldHaveAStatusCodeOf(int statusCode)
      This method validates the response status code
      Parameters:
      statusCode - int with the expected status code

    • validatesResponseWithClientSchema

      @Then("validates the response with the client JSON schema") public void validatesResponseWithClientSchema()
      This method validates the response structure against the client JSON schema

    • deleteAllClientsRegisteredInThisScenario

      @And("delete all clients registered in this scenario") public void deleteAllClientsRegisteredInThisScenario()
      This method deletes all clients created in this scenario

    • iWillCreateANewClientWithName

      @Given("I will create a new client with the name {string}") public void iWillCreateANewClientWithName(String name)
      This method creates a new client with the given name
      Parameters:
      name - String with the name of the client to create and saves the client ID to retrieve the client later

    • iRetrieveTheClient

      @When("I retrieve the client") public void iRetrieveTheClient()
      This method retrieves the client

    • iUpdateTheClientCityTo

      @And("I update the client\'s city to {string}") public void iUpdateTheClientCityTo(String newCity)
      This method updates the client's city
      Parameters:
      newCity - String with the new city to update

    • theResponseStructureMatchesTheClientJsonSchema

      @Then("the response structure matches the client JSON schema") public void theResponseStructureMatchesTheClientJsonSchema()
      This method validates the response structure against the client JSON schema

    • iDeleteTheClient

      @And("I delete the client") public void iDeleteTheClient()
      This method deletes the client

    • theClientShouldNoLongerExistInTheSystem

      @Then("the client should no longer exist in the system") public void theClientShouldNoLongerExistInTheSystem()
      This method verifies the client no longer exists
